page.title: 03LIFE IN WILLEY VILLAGE
page.content: No new housing & continued emphasis on farming has meant a slow change in{ {LIFE STYLE.}Three farms out of four are still working. Once all dairy now Manor Farm is dairy only, Bay House Farm dairy & beef to fatten & Watling Farm (with Elm Farm) arable & beef. No village school means children over 5 being taken to Lutterworth & a very small group of contempories with whom to play.Childern must be taken to a larger centre for all Youth activities There are 2 children under 5,3 between 5 & 12 years & 4 over 12. Community sociallife comes from money raising projects needed to maintain the Hall & Church (whist drives,sherry evenings etc).Each year a village fete is held supported from both in & out- side the village community.Villagers enjoy their closeknit & caring life style.
